      • getCurrentPlatform

        public static IOperatingSystem getCurrentPlatform()
        tries to determine the current operating system
        Returns:
        Current operating system

      • forcePlatform

        public static void forcePlatform(IOperatingSystem p)
        Forces current operating system. This can be used to override the default setting in case OS detection goes wrong(it doesn't go wrong very often) or for testing.
        Parameters:
        p - - The operating system we want to use

      • wrapName

        public static java.lang.String wrapName(java.lang.String name)
        Changes "old" name of operating system to "new". Old refers to names of pre-1.6 MC launcher. New refers to names of post-1.6 MC Launcher
        Parameters:
        name - - Old name of operating system
        Returns:
        New name of operating system

      • osByName

        public static IOperatingSystem osByName(java.lang.String name)
        Finds IOperatingSystem by name
        Parameters:
        name - "New" name of operating system
        Returns:
        IOperatingSystem which suits the criteria
